name: CAT Interstellar
description: A short story inspired by Robert Heinlein's:The Moon Is a Harsh Mistress
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: 2 GHz Quad-Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: 2 GHz Quad-Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nividia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Recommended for 60 FPS
